name: Ring Sans Font Family - Múltiliñgüâl Suppørt
description:
First of all, The Ring Sans Font has a little story. It was created as an example for Typography Exhibition in Moscow. And font was immediately awarded! 8 years later, I decided to continue working on it and improve this font. Ring - Really Circular Typeface I felt inspired by Bauhaus. I've always wanted to design something similar.


Ring Sans Font comes in 3 weights and 6 styles.

The font supports the Latin and Cyrillic alphabet.


Ring Sans is just the beginning of the future big Font Family called Ring!


Available by link below

https://fontbundles.net/vectorgraphiconline/1596855-ring-sans-font-family
